snippet: A strict immigration law did not reduce Oklahoma’s illegal immigrant population. Tens of thousands have stayed put, hiding and striving.
abstract: Strict immigration law passed in 2007 does nothing to reduce Oklahoma's illegal immigrant population, where tens of thousands have remained, hiding in fear and striving in shadows; law makes it a crime to knowingly shelter or transport unauthorized immigrants, while preventing them from obtaining licenses, credentials and public benefits (Series: The Way North).
lead_paragraph: A strict immigration law did not reduce Oklahoma’s illegal immigrant population. Tens of thousands have stayed put, hiding and striving.

headline.main: An American Life, Lived in Shadows
headline.print_headline: An American Life, Played Out in the Shadows
